ã¾ã BOMã®å•é¡ŒãŒæ®‹ã£ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚[BOMé™¤å»ã®æ–¹æ³•](https://www.stefangordon.com/remove-bom-mark-from-text-files-in-python/)ã‚’å‚è€ƒã«ã€BOMã‚’é™¤å»ã™ã‚‹ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ãƒ†ã‚£ãƒªãƒ†ã‚£ã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã¾ã™ï¼š

```diff
- 
+ #!/usr/bin/env python3
+ # -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
+ """
+ UTF-8 BOMé™¤å»ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ãƒ†ã‚£ãƒªãƒ†ã‚£
+ """
+ 
+ import os
+ import sys
+ import codecs
+ 
+ def remove_bom_inplace(path):
+     """BOMãƒãƒ¼ã‚¯ã‚’é™¤å»ã—ã¦ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’in-placeã§æ›¸ãæ›ãˆ"""
+     buffer_size = 4096
+     bom_length = len(codecs.BOM_UTF8)
+     
+     with open(path, "r+b") as fp:
+         chunk = fp.read(buffer_size)
+         if chunk.startswith(codecs.BOM_UTF8):
+             print(f"ğŸ”§ BOMé™¤å»ä¸­: {path}")
+             i = 0
+             chunk = chunk[bom_length:]
+             while chunk:
+                 fp.seek(i)
+                 fp.write(chunk)
+                 i += len(chunk)
+                 fp.seek(bom_length, os.SEEK_CUR)
+                 chunk = fp.read(buffer_size)
+             fp.seek(-bom_length, os.SEEK_CUR)
+             fp.truncate()
+             return True
+         else:
+             print(f"âœ… BOMä¸è¦: {path}")
+             return False
+ 
+ def remove_bom_from_directory(directory):
+     """ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ¬ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒªå†…ã®ã™ã¹ã¦ã®JSONãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‹ã‚‰BOMã‚’é™¤å»"""
+     json_files = []
+     
+     for root, dirs, files in os.walk(directory):
+         for file in files:
+             if file.endswith('.json'):
+                 json_files.append(os.path.join(root, file))
+     
+     print(f"ğŸ“ å¯¾è±¡ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ¬ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒª: {directory}")
+     print(f"ğŸ“„ JSONãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«æ•°: {len(json_files)}")
+     print("=" * 50)
+     
+     removed_count = 0
+     for json_file in json_files:
+         if remove_bom_inplace(json_file):
+             removed_count += 1
+     
+     print("=" * 50)
+     print(f"ğŸ‰ BOMé™¤å»å®Œäº†: {removed_count}/{len(json_files)} ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«")
+     return removed_count
+ 
+ def main():
+     """ãƒ¡ã‚¤ãƒ³å‡¦ç†"""
+     if len(sys.argv) > 1:
+         target = sys.argv[1]
+         if os.path.isfile(target):
+             remove_bom_inplace(target)
+         elif os.path.isdir(target):
+             remove_bom_from_directory(target)
+         else:
+             print(f"âŒ ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼: {target} ãŒè¦‹ã¤ã‹ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“")
+     else:
+         # ãƒ‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒˆã§v1.4.9ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ¬ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒªã‚’å‡¦ç†
+         target_dir = "com.liltoon.pcss-extension-1.4.9"
+         if os.path.exists(target_dir):
+             remove_bom_from_directory(target_dir)
+         else:
+             print(f"âŒ ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼: {target_dir} ãŒè¦‹ã¤ã‹ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“")
+ 
+ if __name__ == "__main__":
+     main() 
```

+     """ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã®SHA256ãƒãƒƒã‚·ãƒ¥ã‚’è¨ˆç®—"""
+     sha256_hash = hashlib.sha256()
+     with open(file_path, "rb") as f:
+         for byte_block in iter(lambda: f.read(4096), b""):
+             sha256_hash.update(byte_block)
+     return sha256_hash.hexdigest().upper()
+ 
+ def verify_zip_contents(zip_path):
+     """ZIPãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã®å†…å®¹ã‚’æ¤œè¨¼"""
+     print(f"ğŸ“¦ ZIPãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«å†…å®¹æ¤œè¨¼: {zip_path}")
+     
+     required_files = [
+         "com.liltoon.pcss-extension/package.json",
+         "com.liltoon.pcss-extension/README.md",
+         "com.liltoon.pcss-extension/CHANGELOG.md",
+         "com.liltoon.pcss-extension/Editor/AvatarSelectorMenu.cs",
+         "com.liltoon.pcss-extension/Runtime/PCSSUtilities.cs",
+         "com.liltoon.pcss-extension/Shaders/lilToon_PCSS_Extension.shader"
+     ]
+     
+     excluded_files = [
+         ".git/",
+         ".github/",
+         "com.liltoon.pcss-extension-1.4.7/",
+         "com.liltoon.pcss-extension-1.4.8/",
+         "com.liltoon.pcss-extension-ultimate/",
+         "Release/",
+         "scripts/",
+         "docs/"
+     ]
+     
+     with zipfile.ZipFile(zip_path, 'r') as zipf:
+         file_list = zipf.namelist()
+         
+         print("âœ… å¿…é ˆãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ç¢ºèª:")
+         for required in required_files:
+             if required in file_list:
+                 print(f"  âœ“ {required}")
+             else:
+                 print(f"  âŒ {required} - è¦‹ã¤ã‹ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ï¼")
+                 return False
+         
+         print("\nğŸ—‘ï¸ é™¤å¤–ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ç¢ºèª:")
+         excluded_found = []
+         for file in file_list:
+             for excluded in excluded_files:
+                 if excluded in file:
+                     excluded_found.append(file)
+         
+         if excluded_found:
+             print("  âŒ é™¤å¤–ã™ã¹ããƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ãŒå«ã¾ã‚Œã¦ã„ã¾ã™:")
+             for file in excluded_found[:10]:  # æœ€åˆã®10å€‹ã®ã¿è¡¨ç¤º
+                 print(f"    - {file}")
+             if len(excluded_found) > 10:
+                 print(f"    ... ä»– {len(excluded_found) - 10} å€‹")
+             return False
+         else:
+             print("  âœ“ é™¤å¤–ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã¯å«ã¾ã‚Œã¦ã„ã¾ã›ã‚“")
+         
+         # package.jsonã®å†…å®¹ç¢ºèª
+         try:
+             with zipf.open("com.liltoon.pcss-extension/package.json") as f:
+                 package_data = json.load(f)
+                 
+             print(f"\nğŸ“‹ package.jsonç¢ºèª:")
+             print(f"  âœ“ name: {package_data.get('name')}")
+             print(f"  âœ“ version: {package_data.get('version')}")
+             print(f"  âœ“ displayName: {package_data.get('displayName')}")
+             
+             if package_data.get('version') != '1.4.9':
+                 print(f"  âŒ ãƒãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒ§ãƒ³ãŒ1.4.9ã§ã¯ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“: {package_data.get('version')}")
+                 return False
+                 
+         except Exception as e:
+             print(f"  âŒ package.jsonèª­ã¿è¾¼ã¿ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼: {e}")
+             return False
+     
+     return True
